Title: Lesbians Gone Wild
Plot: Niki's antics off and on set cause nightmares for her agent as well as the production team. Alice learns that in order to land the high-profile talk show gig, she needs to out people on live TV. Bette takes Phyllis' daughter Molly to visit the movie set. She's beyond bored until Shane takes her to SheBar to see lesbian oil wrestling. Meanwhile, Tasha meets the visiting prosecutor who's about to go against her in the trial.
GuestStars: Dawn Chubai, Sandra Mayo, Donnelly Rhodes, Aaron Craven, Brenda Campbell, Katey Wright, Danielle Kremeniuk, Kelly McGillis, Patricia Velasquez
